text: To start playing, you just need to press any button when launching the .exe file.
Next, a narrator will greet you and ask if you are ready to begin your journey. Choosing Yes starts the game, No exits.

When selecting a class, remember a few rules:
- 0 – return to the main menu to choose an answer.
- 1-20 – select a specific character class to play.
Each character has five words, five monsters, and a boss with a final word.
Use the arrow keys on the numpad to scroll through characters.
Enter any number, and your hero’s intro screen will appear. Press any key to see a fake gameplay loading screen.
Then the game rules will be shown – how many words and monsters you’ll face, what to expect, etc. You’ll experience all of this in the game itself – this is just a guide.

The main gameplay begins: word guessing. You have 5 mistakes allowed, and if you guess the word correctly, you defeat the monster and move to the next word-monster pair. If you fail to guess the word, you lose and start over from character selection.
After guessing all words of your class, you face the final boss with an ultra-long word. Winning completes your class run and returns you to the character selection menu.
